Lusaka Zambia Independent

Curio Collection by Hilton is an upscale hotel brand within Hilton’s portfolio. Curio Collection is a soft brand, meaning its hotels are supported by Hilton, but retain their own individual branding. Hilton selects independent hotels and resorts to be part of Curio Collection.

Ibis Styles Plateau

A fabulous brief to follow. The Ibis styles brand ethos is ‘Always playful, never predictable’. Inspired by local patterns, Skapari created bold striking interiors using playful, vivid colours with locally sourced bespoke artwork. This creates a surprising and bold immersive experience that brings a smile to your face.

Ibis Styles Marcory

A fabulous brief to follow. The Ibis styles brand ethos is ‘Always playful, never predictable’. Inspired by local patterns, Skapari created bold striking interiors using playful, vivid colours with locally sourced bespoke artwork. This creates a surprising and bold immersive experience that brings a smile to your face.

Classic Elegance South Africa

Luxury Brand - Soft refurbishment, stunning and almost iconic building but most certainly an incredibly recognizable building. We created an elegant and timeless interior, balanced with contemporary elements to bring this building into 21st century but still embracing its history.

Radisson Cape Town

The renovation of the Park Inn to a Radisson in Foreshore, led by Skapari, aimed to create and enhance the experience by combining convenience, practicality, and understated elegance and simplicity. The design focuses on creating spaces that are open and light, infusing vitality and functionality into all corners of the hotel.

Mosi Livingstone

Journey into the unexpected - the vast beauty of Africa and its surrounding plains. Etched into beaded fabrics, snapshot of exotic and majestic wildlife. Sublime and evocation…

WeWork Eye of Africa

Both We Work and the Members lounge is a comfortable, contemporary and sophisticated area to afford clients the ability to work and to network out of the conventional corporate environment.

Accor Office Contemporary
